pages.name: Entry Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/na_go_rider_core_id)Kamen Rider Na-Go Core ID$(/l)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Na-Go
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_na_go)Desire Driver (Na-Go)$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Haste

pages.name: Beat Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/beat_raise_buckle)Beat Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Na-Go
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_na_go)Desire Driver (Na-Go)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Haste$(br2)Beat Buckle Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Haste II$(li)Jump Boost II

pages.name: BeatBoost Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/beat_raise_buckle)Beat Buckle$(/l) in your main hand and the $(l:geats/items/boost_raise_buckle)Boost Buckle$(/l) in your off-hand

pages.title: Kamen Rider Na-Go
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver_na_go)Desire Driver (Na-Go)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Haste$(br2)Beat Buckle Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Haste II$(li)Jump Boost II$(br2)Boost Buckle Effects:$(li)Boost

pages.name: Armed Hammer

pages.name: Armed Claw
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/claw_raise_buckle)Claw Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)
